translations.translation: This email address is used by another account.
This username is used by another account.
You have to confirm your email first.
The security code does not match with the picture.
This email is already in use.
The account could not be created.
The confirmation mail could not delivered.
To play the game, you have to acknowledge your email address. Please click the following link:
The password can not be changed.
Your password has been changed. Your new password is:
Instance and team could not be set.
You can change your account password with the following form.
You can completely remove your login and all stored data from this game. For this please press the button and acknowledge your delete request.

You can acknowledge profile deletion by confirming this dialog. Be warned, that all data are removed and can not be restored. If you want to play again you have to register a new user. Your team will be controlled by AI.
Do you really want to buy this item?
Do you really want to sell this item?
Do you really want to repair all items?
Sell price is based on last wage and current morale, but max. 80%.
Do you really want to sell your driver?
Do you really want to end your drivers career?
The driver signed a contract and is now available.
It was not able to get the driver.
Your driver gets trained by this training schedule. Monday till Friday affected normal, Saturday and Sunday everything negatice counts doubled.
Your team has no drivers or cars and can not join this training.
Your team has no drivers or cars and can not join this qualification.
Your team has no drivers or cars and can not join this race.
Both cars are not ready. Some items are missing.
You have no tire sponsor yet.
For qualification, you have to use both tire types at least once. You will be disqualified with the current setup.
For race, you have to use both tire types at least once. You will be disqualified with the current setup.
Your driver will not finish the race with the current setup.
There are no Q3 settings from qualification.
Currently there are no evaluable data.
The mechanic signed a contract and is now available.
It was not able to get the mechanic.

Each mechanic has two different values. This is a basic value (in brackets). This basic value defines wage and bonus and is static. The current value (before brackets) is computed by the basic value and morale. The morale value changes during season.
Do you really want to sell your mechanic?
Your training car can only be used in training and you can only use V00 items for it.
Your admin will prove your team request and will answer it in a few hours. Please consider, that your team choice is only a hint for him and that he may give you another one in case of a conflict.
Your account was created sucessfully, but it is currently inactive. An email was sent to your address. Please click on the link inside to activate your account!
Your account was not activated! Please contact your admin.
This site uses cookies. By continuing to browse this site you are agreeing to our use of cookies.
has been deleted. No more emails will be sent. Email notification can be reactivated in user profile in the game.
To login and play the game, you have to confirm your email address first. For this, click the following link:
"You never really know how quick you are before you reach F1." - Alain Prost
"We will fight as long as we have gasoline. As long as we have ideals, money, courage, hands, arms, the air we breathe and blood in our veins." - Enzo Ferrari

"By being a racing driver you are under risk all the time. By being a racing driver means you are racing with other people. And if you no longer go for a gap that exists, you are no longer a racing driver because we are competing, competing to win. And the main motivation is to compete for victory, it's not to come 3rd, 4th, 5th or 6th." - Ayrton Senna
"If everything seems under control, you're just not going fast enough." - Mario Andretti
"Aerodynamics is for people who can't build engines." - Enzo Ferrari

"The three Michaels - Michael Schumacher, Michael Jordan and Michael Jackson. I wanted to become Michael Jackson when I was young. It was painful to realise that I didn’t have the voice..." - Sebastian Vettel

"All the top drivers are difficult people with complex personalities. I wouldn't go so far as to say nice guys finish last; but the best Formula 1 drivers are driven, motivated, pushy, won't-accept-second-best, immensely competitive people. That's what makes them so good - because they're bastards." - Frank Williams
"Suddenly the steering wheel was in my hands. I tried to put it back on, but it was too late. I was just wondering where I was going to end up." - Kimi Raikkonen
"I will do everything I can to bring the Number One to Ferrari. The whole team and all the fans deserve it." - Michael Schumacher
"Ferrari gives you a special feeling." - Fernando Alonso
"To do something well is so worthwhile that to die trying to do it better cannot be foolhardy. Indeed, life is not measured in years alone, but in achievement." - Bruce McLaren
Racing Manager News: You were fired!

The sporting achievements were unfortunately not in the sense of team management. Therefore, the board has decided to appoint a new manager. You can search for a new team anytime. Follow the following link:
You can log in with this new passwrd. This password can be changed any time from you user profil in game.
Rainy weather prevented all current activities.
Many current points are discussed at the weekly team meeting.
Your sponsors asking for more commitment and a better placement in the next race.
Autograph session with the drivers. The fans are enthusiastic.
Your mechanics work all day on pitstops.
A reporter from the local press accompanies you throughout the day. Next week, an artikle about your work will be published in the newspaper.
TV stations carry numerous interviews with the whole team. No time for more important work.
Photo shoot for the new calendar. Your drivers are posing in front of the car.
An article of an online newspaper mentions your team as the new world championship.
An article of an online newspaper calls your team the worst in your league.
There are rumors that your team is bankrupt. You spend the day trying to convince your sponsors and donors to the contrary.
Your driver pass a medical examination. They are classified as fit as a fiddle.
For a PR appointment you are leading celebrities around the paddock and answering questions.
You discuss the current finances with accounting.
The team management is satisfied with your work.
You take part in a show race for the press and occupy the last place .
For lunch there was your favorite dish today.
You are writing on a book.
There are heated discussions about a performance fee for the drivers.
The work on the car is progressing.
You show your drivers some key points of the current race track.
#Y# trained more than usual, unfortunately without much success.
In a debate with #Y# you deal contentious issues.
The salary negotiations with #Y# lasts very long. There was no solution found yet.
Ticket for #Y# due to low speed .
It is speculated whether #Y# gets a higher point bonus than other drivers.
Your sponsor is very pleased with your work and pays you #X# $ more for sponsorship .
Several fan clubs raise money for your team. You get #X# $ credited.
During transportation a piece of equipment has been damaged. The insurance pays you #X# $ for that damage.
An anonymous letter in the postbox contains #X# $ for the team.
A rich racing fan inherited the team #X# $.
In a team meeting it is a stormy affair. You are using a lot of profanity. For each one you put 5 $ in the team spot. After the meeting, there is a total of #X# $.
A nonprofit organization is grateful for the mention in the last TV interview and pays you #X# $.
An advertising agency attract endowments raises another #X# $ of sponsors money from private donors.
Your tires sponsor #Y# investes another #X# $ in your team.
An investor is offering you #X# $, so you drive more slowly in the next race. You take the money and ignore his demand.
Your team wins the lottery. #X# $ for your team.
An investigation determines that too little prize money was paid for your team. You get #X# $.
Birthday Party! All relatives and friends put together #X# $ for the team and hoping for more victories.
The tax office gives you #X# $ on overpaid taxes.
Your tax advisor helps you to save #X# $ in taxes .
#Y# is again too late for training and is punished to pay back #X# $ of his last salary pay back .
#Y# can take on #X# $ of sponsors money at an event for the team.
#Y# trained the last few weeks as a madman and improved #X# by #Z# points.
#Y# receives training lessons by a special coach and improved #X# by #Z# points.
#Y# is celebrated by numerous fans. The mood improves by #Z# points.
#Y# receives numerous compliments for his last race. The mood improves by #Z# points.
#Y# begrudges a break and finally comes to reading a good book. The freshness improves by #Z# points.
#Y# spends a weekend with his girlfriend in a thermal bath. The freshness improves by #Z# points.
#Y# exerts the track in the simulator and gets to know the key points better. The speed improves by #Z# points.
A dispute in the team is settled by #Y#. #Y# gets #Z# experience points.
You are generous and can address the training this week a little more relaxed. Your drivers get added #Z# mood points.
A salary increase for #Y# costs the team #X# $ . In return, the mood increases by #Z# points.
Your drivers have to be present at a team party. The sponsors are enthusiastic and donate a total of #X# € for the team. All drivers lose #Z# points of mood.
The team is well established. Work is currently a lot of fun, your mechanics are gaining #Z# mood.
A back pay for #Y# costs the team #X# $ and increases the mood by #Z# points.
The profile site shows you all informations about your current logged in manager. Apart from information about your Name, date and time of the last login there are some interesting settings to do:
With an interactive picture program you can create your own individual manager picture. This picture is shown other players in various screens.
This is the time in seconds you will see the standing of one round for qualification and race.
You can switch languages as you like. A change will display texts from the choosen language. You can change it on your login page too.
With this formular you can change the password of your login. The change is done immediately, this means the next time you have to login, you need to use the new password.

If you do not want to play Formula todream anymore, you can delete your profile. All data will be deleted. Be careful. After a successfull delete, all profile data is deleted and we have no way to reset it. You data (login name, password, userrname, E-Mail address, …) will be deleted from our database. You team will be managed by an AI till another user want to manage it.
You can reach you personal profile page from the upper right corner everywhere in the game.
The statistics view has many subcategories and represents a lot of information about drivers, teams and managers.

At the tracks menu you see the season calendar with all tracks, the order, all informations about nation, track profile and date of the race. If a race was already computed, you can see the result again. The list also displays the name of the drivers who won the race in each league.

This site gives you all relevant information about the teams in your league and other teams in other leagues.You find the team name, manager, driver ,sponsor and tire sponsor information in a very useful table. You can also filter by league.

The drivers championship is a list of drivers sorted by the number of points they already got that season. You can see how good your own drivers are and how much points do you need to get world champion. Again you can filter this list by league.

The teams championship is equal to the drivers championship. Teams are sorted by the number of points they got the current season. You can see how much points you need to get world champion. The list also shows you ascender and descender of the league. Again a filter for league will show you the current situation in other leagues.

The managers championship is a little bit different to the other two championships. It counts the number of points over all seasons. So you can compete with other managers to see how is the best manager of all time.

The youth league is an additional rating for drivers and teams. If you want to take part, you have to use the third car, your training car. Every trainings round counts, each car has the same items (only V00 are allowed). Which youth driver drives the fastest training laps?
This is the main menu point of the whole game. You will visit this menu very often. It is split into the three days of a Grand Prix weekend.

All three submenu points are similar and show you information about your driver and his or her race car. You can see the drivers image his or her name and all effects done by your mechanics. Apart from that you see a value for your driver and your car in percentage. This gives you a hint how good you are.You will see, that with other car items or better trained drivers this values will be better or worse. Take care of it!
Below this information you find sliders. With this sliders you can make your setup. This is divided into:

How many rounds do you want do drive? In training, this value says how much rounds a driver will drive till he comes back to your garage. In qualification you can set how many rounds the driver should drive in each qualification session. For the race you can setup how many rounds a driver drive rounds till he makes the next pit stop.
You can see all tires you have for this weekend. You have to choose which tire set you want to drive with. Each tire set shows how many kilometers are driven with it and shows you how good they are.
You set the angle for your front wing. The higher the angle the higher will be the traction on the front axis.
You set the angle for your rear wing. The higher the angle the higher will be the traction on the rear axis.
For the front suspension you can set it harder or softer. If it is softer, your front tires will spring better.
For the rear suspension you can set it harder or softer. If it is softer, your rear tires will spring better.
This is another important value to change the traction of your car. The tire setting depends mostly on the track surface and the current weather.
You can vary the brake balance from the middle of the car to the front or to the back.
Your gearbox is very important if the track has many curves. It varies the gearing of your car.

The training can be used to find your perfect setting for the rest of the Grand Prix weekend. Each driver has 60 rounds to drive. The better your setup, the faster the lap times. Can you find the perfect setup and drive the fastest lap?

If the qualification is computed, you will only see the result of the training. You can filter this result by tire types to see if other drivers may have problems with special tire types. You can also see the results of all other leagues.
After setting a number of rounds, and all car settings, your driver can drive some rounds. After that you see his or her fastest lap and your driver may give you some hints. .

The driver comments depends on the number of driven rounds. After one round a driver may not give you a comment. The comment is always the worst setting, so if it is not colored red, you are on a good way to the perfect setting. You can drive training rounds till the qualification was computed:
Difference smaller than 20, but greater than 10
Difference smaller than 10, but greater than 5
Difference smaller than 5, but greater than 2
Difference smaller than 2, but greater than 0
Always the value with the greatest difference is mentioned by your driver.
For qualification you can set up individual setups for each of the three qualification sessions. You can also set the numer of rounds your driver should drive, but not more than 12 rounds.
Please remember, that you have to use both types of tires. Otherwise your driver will be disqualified.
For the race the setup is equal to qualification. You can make up to 10 individual settings, with different numbers of laps. After each setting, the driver will make a pit stop.
For your race tactics, please take care of this important points:
you always have to do at least two different settings, you can only drive 40 rounds without a pit stop
you have to do as much settings, that the total number of rounds is equal of higher the number of laps for this track. Otherwise your driver wont reach the goal line.
the first setup has the same tire than the last setting in qualification (third session). Please take care, that your tire is not in a too bad condition.

For most races you only need two settings with one pit stop.A good tactic could be to drive more sessions with 3,4 or even 5 pit stops. This depends on your tires and the current track. The race settings site displays a table that prints out your settings. With this you have a good overview when a driver makes his or her pit stop.

The presentation of the race is optimized for a maximum of action. You see an animated table which shows you the standing of each lap. You can watch the laps one by one. Accidents and pit stops and Safty Car laps make the race very interesting and fascinating.

After the last round, you see the result of the race. You have now to opportunity to see the ceremony and hear the hymn of the winning drivers nation. You also get a good overview how much championship points each driver receives for this race.
Budget is the central category of the game and situated in the middle of your menu tree. This category has the following functions.
The survey site displays a general table of information about the financial situation of your team. This overview is splitted into three steps:

This section presents you the most important value, your current capital. It also shows you in detail how it is computed. Income and expenditures are split into two columns each also split into fix and variable costs as different rows.

Fixed costs or fixed income are all one time payments or incomes. This section is also split into income and expenditures and all cost centers.Recorded are bought car items, repair costs or all things that get bought.
Variable costs and incomes are mostly depended on points that are received during season. It is hard to calculate this costs, so it is important to keep an eye on it.
The survey is only a source of static information, there is no possible interaction to do.

On this detail site, you get a list of all transactions that were done. The list also contains the date and time of all account movements with a text and the appropriate sum. On this site you also have no interaction.

This is the most important site under budget.At the first call you will see offers for both, main sponsors and tire sponsors.There are always three offers that suitable for your league and the team class but they are random.
A main sponsor has only one purpose for a team, it pays money. There are two different values:
This value is the contract value and the sponsor will pay the full sum directly without any delay.
The bonus is for points. The sponsor will pay you the amount for every point your drivers will get during the season. The money will be transfered after each race.

After you signed a contract to one of your offers, this sponsor is your main sponsor for the rest of the season, there is o further interaction possible. You can always see the values of your sponsor.

A tire sponsor also pays your money like the main sponsor. But further that, a tire sponsor has a second complete different function. It delivers you tire sets for the Grand Prix weekend. When choosing a tire sponsor, it is important to compare the tire statistics. Each tire sponsor delivers different tires with different characteristics. Decide which tire set fits best to your team and your tactics:
The racing commission descides which tire (dry or rain) you have touse. This is done by the overall weather of the weekend.
You can use hard or soft tires for your cars. The two have completely different characteristics.

The performance of your tire depends on two values. This is the lap number of the tire, the longer you drive with the same tire, the worst is performs. The other value is attrition. The performance of the tire is different for each lap number. Hard tires are better after some rounds, soft tires are best the first rounds. The diagram describes this tire performance.
There are two tire types in this game. In qualification and race you have to use both of them at least one time. The two types have the following differences:

Hard tires need more time to reach the optimal lap times.This means the fastest possible lap can be driven in lap 5 to 10. The main advantage of hard tires is that they can drive longer with a constant performance and they get worse after a long time. The disadvantage is, that hard values are not as fast as soft tires. Hard tires are good for long races.

Soft tires are the fastest tires with the best performance. They are ideal for qualification. A soft tire has its best performance approximately till lap 10. After this, the tire gets worse very fast. This tire is perfect for qualification.
On this menu point you find everything that belongs to your cars.

The survey shows you all racing cars and your training car. The first interaction is to set a driver,, a car can only have one driver and a driver can only drive one car. The driver can be changed till the training is over. If the qualification is already computed, the drivers cannot be changed till the next training starts. Apart from the drivers, the site also gives a list of all items for this car. You can change the risk level of each one, see the skill level and also the current condition.

With the risk value, you can tune your items individually. The values shows you the normal skill of the item and the skill it will have if you use the highest risk. Be warned. The higher the risk, the faster the condition gets worse. If the condition drops under 1 percent the car will stop with a technical damage.
In stock are all car items that you have bought. You can do a number of different interactions with it:
Items can be assigned to a racing car. There are only two rules for that: 1. an item can only be assigned to one car, 2. a training car can only use V00 items.
If an item is assigned to a car, you can remove it. A removed item goes back to stock.
If the condition of the item is below 100 percent you can repair it. The costs for repairing items depends on the costs of the item and the current condition.
You can also sell your items. You have to mention, the you will never get the full purchase price back. The current sell price depends on the current condition of the item.
In stock you can also filter by item type. This is helpful to see if you already have bought a special item type or not.

You start the game with a team with an empty stock. You have to buy items! So you need to open item market site and buy individual items. There are 10 different types of it, all with different versions with different costs. You have to mention:
This items are free to use and costs no money. This is ideal for small teams without a budget or for your training car.

This versions of items costs money. They are much better than V00 items and used for racing cars. It depends on your team class if you can buy better items. A league 3 team will never be able to buy V10 items. Only items are shown that you are able to buy. If you have no money, only V00 items are visible!
You can buy items directly. They are in your stock. The “in stock” column shows you how much items of that type are already in your stock.
The mechanics site is split into two areas:
This site gives you an survey of all mechanics of the team. The information on the top of the page shows you how your mechanic affects your driven lap times:

If mechanics are assigned to work for pit stops, they reduce the time it takes to do the pit stop during race. The amount of time that is safed depends on the number of assigned mechanics and their skill level at pit stop.
Each assigned mechanic improves your setup value of all cars. With better setup values, your cars will drive faster lap times. This effect depends on the race, it is different for each race.
The effect is nearly the same as for setup, but only for your tire value (which is the most important value for lap time!).

Each mechanic has different values (as drivers also) for all mechanic skills. All skills are effected by morale. Morale can change during season, values for all mechanic skills are constant for the lifetime of a mechanic.
Mechanics can be sold for an amount of money. How much you will get depends on the cost of this mechanic.

The transfer market from mechanics works as the transfer market from drivers.A table shows all free mechanics that do not have a contract with a team. The table can be sorted by each mechanic value or costs. So you can find mechanics that are perfect for your team. The main difference to driver transfer market is, that mechanics are bought directly, no bids were made. Each team can buy up to 10 mechanics.
The driver area is split into this 3 categories.

In your driver survey you get general informations about all of your drivers. This site is your primarily source of information about drivers. You get static information like the nationality, age and current contract information. For the financial information, you have following possibilities – depending on the driver:

Normal drivers can be sold during the season. The sell price depends on the current morale of the driver and his sell price. The worse it is, the lower will be the sell price. You can only get a maximum of 80 percent of the purchase price back.
Youth drivers that are hired can not be sold. You can only end their career. Attention! You can only hire a certain amount of youth drivers each season, so be careful to end someone’s career.

A very important survey is located under the driver information. This table gets you the current driver strengths and also displays how they change during season. You can actively change the values by driver training.

This site shows you training plans for your drivers. You can set up individual workouts for each day of week. This planned training is done week per week till it gets changed again. For each type of workout, you get a detailed table of information. This table shows how individual values will cahnge. Each driver skill may gets worse (-1 or -2) or gets better (+1). The percentage display next to it indicates how likely this change occurs. The following workouts are possible:
Nothing will be trained (default). This workout, if you can tell it so, is important for morale of the driver. Leisure makes your driver happy.
Stamina trains the drivers Stamina, but also Persistence and Speed.

The freshness is particularly important in the everyday stresses of a professional racing driver. This can be improved by mental training. Your driver likes this workout, so it also affects his morale.
Improves the driver’s speed value. Your driver loves to drive fast, so this workout also affects his morale.
In addition to speed, the second important driver property. A good persistance leads to less accidents and constant lap times.
Is nearly the same as “no training”. But here the workout is optimized, so all negative effects are less bad.
Appart from all normal workouts, there are extended versions. A specially trained coach provides well better results, but these workouts cost money.
For your training, there is one very important additional rule. For the weekend (saturday and sunday), the negative effects of your workout is doubled. So take care!

On transfer market you will find a list of all drivers that have no contract with one of the teams. The list depends on your budget, it only lists drivers that you can afford. This list of drivers can be sorted by individual driver skills or costs. With this you can find the perfect driver for your team.

You can’t buy drivers directly.You can make a bid and you get displayed the chance to get that driver. Other managers can also bid for this driver, other bids may change your chance of success. So it is a good idea to check the current bid regularly. A driver accepts the best bid 48 hours after the first bid was placed.

The last driver on your transfer list is a placeholder for youth drivers. You can engage a youth driver directly. His name, nationality and other values like driver skills are computed randomly. His driving skills may be lower than other drivers, but you can train your youth driver to get much better.
The Dashboard is the first site you will see after login. There you get a survey about all important information. The following information is visible:

A countdown tells you how long it takes to the next event. Events are qualification, race and the time till the training of the next race will start. If qualification or race where already computed, there will be a link to the result instead of the countdown.
Names of your drivers and their current ranking in driver championship and in braces the last ranking. The evolution of the ranking is obvious at the first glance.
You can see the current ranking of your team in constructors championship. The last ranking is also visible to see the actual development in this championship.
Same as driver and team information, but only for you as team manager.
With this tutorial you will get ready for the game. You can use this help any time or you can find out how it works alone. At Racing Manager you are a team manager and take control of a racing team.

It depends of the display size of your device if the game menu is displayed on the left side or as button in the right upper corner. Next to this menu button, you find you profile with settings. The following sections will accompany you in the daily life of a manager:
After login you will see the dashboard. There you find the current position of your drivers and of your team in championship. You also see when next qualification or race is computed.
You can buy, sell or train your drivers.
You can buy, sell or assign a mechanic to a job.
You can tune up your racing car, buy parts, repair them of build a racing car out of it.
You get an overview of your budget and can sign sponsor contracts to get more money.
Setup for training, qualification or race. After an event is comuted, you will find the result there.
Many different statistics about drivers and teams.
Get in contact with other players.
All kind of information about this game.
A racing team needs different things. You have to concern about these, otherwise you can not take part in the race and your team may fires you.

You need money to buy drivers, mechanics or car items. There are fix costs but also variable costs like point bonus payments. Other variable costs are for repairing your car. Go to Budget -> Sponsor and sign a contract with one of the main sponsors and for a tire sponsor.
HINT: without tire sponsor it is not possible take part in the race. Your team would not be amused.

Up to two drivers can drive for you in the race. Apart from this you can use a third car with a youth driver in training. Your youth driver will take part in youth league und get some points and earn money. Go to Driver -> Transfer market and find good drivers without a contract with a team. You can bid for one of it, after 48 hours he or she will take your offer or not. In this time other players can also bid for this driver. Drivers always accept the best offer.
HINT: you can buy two random youth drivers each saison and you get it immediately. You can use this drivers as long as you have no other better drivers.

Each team has 3 cars (2 racing cars, 1 training car). These cars have no items - you have to buy them. Go to Car -> Item market and buy for each car all 10 different items. You can choose for each item of price and level. Go to Car -> Stock there you see all items that you buyed. You can assign them to one of your cars. Go to Car -> Overview an see your cars with assigned items.
HINT: you can only drive with your cars if they have all 10 items assigned and if there is a driver assigned. An overview for all cars is at Car -> Overview. Only there you can assign drivers.

Now you have money, drivers and cars. You can take part in the race. A race weekend consists of training, qualification and race. At the training you can drive rounds to find your optimal setup. Drive some rounds and ask your driver about this setup. A better setup results in better round times. Use all training rounds to find a perfect setup for this track!
HINT: buy parts for your training car and a youth driver to use a third car in training to drive more rounds to find a better setup.

The qualification is computed automatically. You need to make a setup for all 3 qualification sessions.
HINT: the rules say, that you have to use both tire types (soft and hard) with at least one setup.

The race is also computed automatically. You have to time your sessions and pit stops, to drive with optimal tire performance. There are two major rules: you start the race with the same setup as in third qualification session. You have to use both tire types (soft and hard) and drive at least one lap.

With these informations you know the basics and you can now fight for the championship. The Racing Manager offers many other things to optimize your timings to drive faster. Take a look at the next chapters or try the game and find it out. There are mechanics, driver training, race analyse and statistics!
The following chapters describe all parts of the game in detail. If there are questions that are not already are answered, feel free to use the forum and ask other users or the developers.
